short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create a link to a specific portion of a page by selecting a text snippet and using right click of a mouse.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you sharing a link to a very long page and want users to land on a specific section of it?

Use this extension to create deep links to web pages and send users to any text part of the page.

This is useful when sharing long articles, manuals and other long online documents.

How this extension works:

1. Highlight a short piece of text on any web page
2. Right click and select "copy text fragment"
3. Paste the link to share with others

When someone clicks on your deep link they'll land on the exact part of the text you wanted.
